SEARCH
Package model.GameState

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
model.GameState.GameState
public class GameState extends Object
The class that represents the state of the game, it contains all the players, the common table and the current state of the game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameState(ArrayList<String> nickNames, String id, int i, ModelListener listener)
    this is a variation of the default constructor, ONLY USED FOR THE CONTROLLER TESTS
    GameState(ArrayList<String> nickNames, String id, ModelListener modelListener, ModelTranslator modelTranslator, Set<String> disconnected)
    class constructor: creates a new Player for each name contained in nickNames, creates a new CommonTable and calls the method to initialize it

    • GameState

      public GameState(ArrayList<String> nickNames, String id, ModelListener modelListener, ModelTranslator modelTranslator, Set<String> disconnected)
      class constructor: creates a new Player for each name contained in nickNames, creates a new CommonTable and calls the method to initialize it
      Parameters:
      nickNames - ArrayList of Strings
      id - the unique id for gameState
      modelListener - the model listener
      modelTranslator - the model controller
      disconnected - the disconnected

  • Method Details

    • calculateFinalPoints

      public void calculateFinalPoints()
      this method is called at the end of the game, it checks for each Player if they completed any Objective(both secret and commoon)

    • setLastTurnTrue

      public void setLastTurnTrue()
      checks if any player reached 20 points or if both the gold and the resource decks are empty

    • nextPlayer

      public void nextPlayer()
      updates currentPlayer

    • setPlayerPawnColor

      public void setPlayerPawnColor(Pawn pawnColor)
      INTERFACE METHOD based on Player input, the method sets the selected pawn color for the player
      Parameters:
      pawnColor - Pawn selected by the Player

    • setTurnState

      public void setTurnState(TurnState state)
      when the state of gameState is modified, a notification is sent in broadcast to all clients
      Parameters:
      state - the state to be set

    • distributeSecretOjectives

      public void distributeSecretOjectives()
      Distribute secret ojectives.

    • setPlayerSecretObjective

      public void setPlayerSecretObjective(String cardId, String player)
      INTERFACE METHOD based on Player input, the method sets the secret objective for the player
      Parameters:
      cardId - the id of the selected secret objective
      player - the player selecting the secret objective

    • playingTurn

      public void playingTurn()
      checks for each card in the turnPlayer hand if it can be placed. information about whether a card is placeable and where it can be placed are then sent to the turnPlayer

    • setStartingCardFace

      public void setStartingCardFace(boolean faceSide, String player)
      INTERFACE METHOD based on Player input, the method sets the faceSide that will be visible for the starting card when placed
      Parameters:
      faceSide - FaceSide selected by the Player
      player - the player selecting the starting card

      Integer representing the points of the player whose turn it is.

    • getPlayerHandCard

      public PlayableCard getPlayerHandCard(int index)
      This method returns a PlayableCard object from the hand of the current player (turnPlayer) at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the card in the player's hand.
      Returns:
      PlayableCard object at the specified index in the player's hand.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index invalid input: '<' 0 || index >= size()).

    • getPlayers

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
      This method returns an ArrayList of Player objects currently in the game.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Player objects.

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect(String playerID)
      allows a player back in the game
      Parameters:
      playerID - the name of the player to be added again

    • setPlayerActive

      public void setPlayerActive(int index)
      sets the player in an active state
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the player

    • inizializationReconnection

      public void inizializationReconnection(Player p)
      This method is used to notify changes when a player reconnects during the initialization phase. It sends notifications about the player's nickname, their card disposition, available places, and points.
      Parameters:
      p - The player who is reconnecting.

    • starterCardReconnection

      public void starterCardReconnection(Player player)
      This method is used to display a notification about the starter card when a player reconnects. It sends notifications about the player's nickname, their starter card, and their pawn color.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who is reconnecting.

    • objectiveCardReconnection

      public void objectiveCardReconnection(Player player)
      This method is used to display a notification about the objective card when a player reconnects. It sends notifications about the turn player's nickname, the reconnecting player's nickname, and their secret objective.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who is reconnecting.

    • setPlayerInactive

      public void setPlayerInactive(int index)
      sets the player in an inactive state
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the player

    • recoveryObjectiveChoice

      public void recoveryObjectiveChoice(Player player)
      if the turn palyer disconnects before choosing the secret objective, the firs of the two objectives is chosen and the face card is assigned for the starter card
      Parameters:
      player - the disconnected player

    • recoveryStarterCard

      public void recoveryStarterCard(Player player)
      if the turn palyer disconnects before choosing the starter card face, the face side is automatically played
      Parameters:
      player - the disconnected player

    • recoveryDrawing

      public void recoveryDrawing(Player player)
      if the turn palyer disconnects and has palced a card but still has to draw, he will draw from the first available deck, if no deck is available he will then draw a card from the open deck. The order of the decks is: (1)resource deck, (2) gold deck, (3) open resources, (4) open gold
      Parameters:
      player - the disconnected player

    • recoverPlacement

      public void recoverPlacement(Player player)
      if the turn palyer disconnects and has not palced a card yet, the turn passes to the next player
      Parameters:
      player - the disconnected player
